name: Pindenburg
description:
Climb into your pointy-headed rocket suit and reach for the skies. Earn points by flying into enemy airships. Be careful not to let them escape! Keep clear of the red biplane and the green toxic cloud or you risk losing a life. Score 10 points to get a life back and score 99 to win the game.

Controls: Move using Left arrow, Up arrow and Right Arrow. Press the X key to advance to the next screen.

Acknowledgements: Made by oeloeloel with music and encouragement from @edwardiii.

The game was created with the incredible DragonRuby Game Toolkit. The initial version was created with Pico-8 and owes an enormous debt to Pico's Fantasy Console visual style. The music and sound effects were also created with Pico-8.

Thanks to the DragonRuby team as well as the friendly, talented people at discord.dragonruby.org.
